Name: Intel B660M Micro-ATX Motherboard
Details: Chipset: B660, Form Factor: Micro-ATX, Socket: LGA1700, Memory: DDR4 (up to 5333 MT/s OC), PCIe 4.0 Support, 2x M.2 Slots, USB 3.2 Gen 2, WiFi: Optional

Name: AMD B550 ATX Motherboard
Details: Chipset: B550, Form Factor: ATX, Socket: AM4, Memory: DDR4 (up to 5100 MT/s OC), PCIe 4.0 x16 GPU Slot, 2x M.2 Slots (one PCIe 4.0), USB 3.2 Gen 2, WiFi: Optional

Name: Intel Z790 ATX Motherboard
Details: Chipset: Z790, Form Factor: ATX, Socket: LGA1700, Memory: DDR5 (up to 7800 MT/s OC) or DDR4 Variant Models, PCIe 5.0 GPU and M.2 Support, 4x M.2 Slots, USB 3.2 Gen 2x2, Integrated WiFi 6E on most models

Name: AMD X670E ATX Motherboard
Details: Chipset: X670E, Form Factor: ATX, Socket: AM5, Memory: DDR5 (up to 8000 MT/s OC), PCIe 5.0 for GPU and Storage, 4x M.2 Slots, USB 4.0 Support, WiFi 6E Integrated

Name: Intel B760M Micro-ATX Motherboard
Details: Chipset: B760, Form Factor: Micro-ATX, Socket: LGA1700, Memory: DDR5 (up to 7200 MT/s OC) or DDR4 Variant, PCIe 5.0 GPU Slot (Optional), 2x M.2 Slots, USB 3.2 Gen 2, WiFi: Optional

Name: AMD A620M Micro-ATX Motherboard
Details: Chipset: A620, Form Factor: Micro-ATX, Socket: AM5, Memory: DDR5 (up to 6400 MT/s OC), PCIe 4.0 GPU and Storage Support, 2x M.2 Slots, Budget AM5 Option, No PCIe 5.0, WiFi: Optional

Name: AMD X570 ATX Motherboard
Details: Chipset: X570, Form Factor: ATX, Socket: AM4, Memory: DDR4 (up to 5100 MT/s OC), PCIe 4.0 Full Platform Support, 2-3x M.2 Slots, USB 3.2 Gen 2, Optional WiFi 6
